name: Intergalactic Arena: First Blood
description:
Different creatures from all the galaxies  gather every season in the Intergalactic Arena. It's the only place in the Universe where they can freely kill each other without starting a war.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

arrows -  move

SPACE - jump/double jump

Z - shoot

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
